english.segment1: Don't get jaded now. Cause it ain't over. Before you know somehow. We're going to find some closure. I've been unwound. But I won't break. And I have found. It's not too late
english.segment2: So, don't get jaded now. The sun will rise. Don't get jaded now. We will survive. Don't get jaded now. We're still alive
english.segment3: I'm in need of resurrection. Won't you please. Bring new direction. Cause, all my faith is nearly gone. And I'm so tired of holding on
english.segment4: But, don't get jaded now. The sun will rise. Don't get jaded now. We are alive. Don't get jaded now. We will survive
english.segment5: And oh it's been great trip. Getting here. We all got lost in music. Then came fear. And I'm so scared. But I can't be scared
english.segment6: I will make it through. You will make it through. I will make it through. Yeah we'll make it through
english.segment7: Don't get jaded now. Don't get jaded now
english.segment8: I'm not scared. Hold on. Don't get jaded now the sun will rise
